attributes.action: Stop messing about with Brexit and honour the Referendum and vote to get us out
attributes.additional_details: There have been three years wasted by MP's and the Media putting things in the way of good negotiations to get the best deal there has been too much negativity from all parties. It is about time a deal was settled finally.
attributes.background: Company shareholders vote on a policy, Directors & employees follow that policy even if they personally do not like it. Any employee including Directors would be dismissed if they hampered negotiations for that policy, the UK should be run like a company, voters as the shareholder's MP as Directors
